channel.title: Comments on: SQL Server 2008 Service Pack 3 has been released
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Naomi Nosonovsky
item.dc:creator: Naomi Nosonovsky
item.content:encoded:
Do you know if we can install it without installing the prior SP? My colleague never installed any SPs, so she may want to install SP3 – is it cumulative?

Thanks in advance.

item.title: By: David Forck (thirster42)
item.dc:creator: David Forck (thirster42)
item.description: but... i just got sp2 installed a couple months back.... sigh
item.content:encoded: but… i just got sp2 installed a couple months back…. sigh
